summary: Iteration 17 - Dynamic Form Fields Integration Testing: All features working correctly. Field Registry page loads at /field-registry with modules, entities, Kanban stages, and form fields. Add Lead form on /crm/leads now renders fields dynamically from Field Registry configuration with sections (Basic Info, Address, Classification, Follow-up), required field markers (*), and dropdown options.
seed_data_creation: Created test lead 'TEST_Dynamic Form Company' to verify form submission
context_for_next_testing_agent: Dynamic form fields integration is fully functional. The useFieldRegistry hook and DynamicFormFields component are now properly connected to LeadFormDialog. Forms render fields dynamically from Field Registry configuration with proper sections, required markers, and dropdown options.

field_registry_page_load.details: Page loads correctly with modules (CRM, Inventory, Accounts, Production, Procurement, HRMS) and entities

field_registry_entities.details: Entity selector updates based on selected module

kanban_stages_tab.details: Shows 9 stages with color badges and drag handles for reordering

form_fields_tab.details: Shows 20 fields organized by sections with Required badges and field type indicators

add_lead_form_dynamic_fields.details: Add Lead form renders fields dynamically from Field Registry with proper sections

form_sections_grouping.details: Form fields are grouped by sections as configured in Field Registry

dropdown_options_from_registry.details: Select/dropdown fields show options from Field Registry configuration

multiselect_field.details: Multiselect field renders clickable badges for selection

customize_fields_button.details: Customize Fields button in form header opens Field Registry in new tab with module=crm&entity=leads

lead_creation_with_dynamic_form.details: Successfully created lead using dynamic form - 'Lead created' toast shown

kanban_stages_in_leads_page.details: Leads Pipeline shows all 9 stages from Field Registry with correct colors

integration_architecture.description: Dynamic form fields integration using useFieldRegistry hook and DynamicFormFields component
